mapper.select: select * from qt_info order by qt_no ASC
select cart_no, mb_name, qt_name, cart_stock, qt_price from qt_cart as qc join qt_info as qi on qi.qt_no = qc.qt_no join adullam_member as am on am.mb_id = qc.mb_id where qc.mb_id = #{mb_id}
mapper.insert: insert into qt_cart(mb_id, qt_no, cart_stock) values(#{mb_id}, #{qt_no}, #{cart_stock})
mapper.delete: delete from qt_cart where cart_no = #{cart_no} and mb_id = #{mb_id}
mapper.insert: insert into qt_order(mb_name, total_price, o_date) values(#{mb_name}, #{total_price}, now())
